SELECT H.AP_INV_ID AP_INV_ID , H.AP_VND_CD AP_VND_CD , H.AP_VND_INV_NUM AP_VND_INV_NUM , H.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM , H.REM_SQ_NUM REM_SQ_NUM , H.AP_VND_INV_NUM INVOICE_NUM_L50_IF , H.INV_DT INVOICE_DATE_L8_IF , H.AC_INV_TOT_COST_AMT INVOICE_AMOUNT_N15_IF , H.AP_INV_SRC_NM SOURCE_L20_IF
, H.INV_HDR_DESC_TXT DESCRIPTION_L240_IF
, H.COA_CMPY_CD COA_1_L3_IF , H.COA_BR_CD COA_2_L3_IF , H.COA_CC_CD COA_3_L6_IF , H.COA_ACCT_CD COA_4_L8_IF , H.COA_PROD_CD COA_5_L2_IF , H.COA_CH_CD COA_6_L3_IF , H.COA_AFFL_CD COA_7_L3_IF , H.COA_PROJ_CD COA_8_L4_IF , H.COA_EXTN_CD COA_9_L3_IF
, CASE WHEN V.ARCS_SPLY_SITE_ID IS NULL THEN H.AP_VND_CD ELSE TO_CHAR(V.ARCS_SPLY_SITE_ID) END AS VENDOR_SITE_ID_L15_IF
, T.VND_PMT_TERM_NM TERMS_NAME_L50_IF , H.CCY_CD CODE_CURRENCY_L3_IF , H.ACTL_EXCH_RATE EXCHANGE_RATE_N15_IF , H.ACTL_EXCH_RATE_ENT_DT EXCHANGE_DATE_L8_IF , H.PAY_ALONE_FLG EXCL_PAY_FLAG_L1_IF FROM CM_IF_OPEN_AP_HDR H ,VND_PMT_TERM T
,VND V
WHERE H.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND H.IF_PROC_STS_CD = 'N' AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = T.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND H.VND_PMT_TERM_CD = T.VND_PMT_TERM_CD(+) AND T.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = V.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND H.AP_VND_CD = V.VND_CD AND V.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
